name: The Arena - Prototype
description:
The Arena is a simple wavespawner based third-person melee fighter.

As the player you will spawn into an enclosed arena and met with waves of enemies. The aim in this prototype is purely to survive all waves.

WAVES:

1-5: Ghosts - unarmed, low damage

6-10: Wraiths - unarmed, high damage

11: Skeleton Boss - 2h sword, very high damage

CONTROLS:

mouse: to direct character

mouse button 1: attack (multiple click to chain attacks)

mouse button 2: Shield block

W: move forward

S: backpeddle

D: strafe right

A: strafe left

Space: jump

Ctrl: roll Esc: pause game (menu)
